Reviews.Title: Sprint phone Samsung Seek
Reviews.Author: b Smith
Reviews.Content: The phone works great but it was rated as "excellent condition" and the screen is very, very scratched up. I was disappointed with that as this was a gift for my daughter who loves this phone and I ordered this one for Christmas as her other phone had broken.

Reviews.Title: Not all that
Reviews.Author: Frances Jean
Reviews.Content: The phone is smaller than it looks. the touch screen responds really slow. I'd rather go back to a flip phone.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Chris "Chris"
Reviews.Content: I owned this phone and loved it so I wanted to replace it when mine got damaged. The phone worked for a few days with no problem and I was happy but then the text messages started appearing with overlapped letters and sometimes the first letter of the line would appear at the end of the line. Example:  onday, June 17, 2013  M. So I took the phone to sprint to see if the phone was worth fixing. They told me there was something wrong with the screen and it would need replaced. I had noticed that when I got the phone the white sticker on the phone was partially red and asked sprint about it ( since my original phone battery sticker was white) he told me that was an indicator that the battery had been wet at some point.
